error.signature: ERROR: Could not install packages due to an OSError: [Errno 28] No space left on device
error.regex: No space left on device.*pip|pip.*Errno 28|Could not install.*No space

verdict.summary: Disk full during pip install. /tmp or pip cache filling up.

dead_ends.why_fails: Helps but the package itself may need space for extraction

workarounds.action: Clear pip cache: pip cache purge
Set TMPDIR to a volume with more space: export TMPDIR=/path/with/space
Free disk space: remove old virtualenvs, Docker images, or old log files
workarounds.how: remove old virtualenvs, Docker images, or old log files

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Both produce similar messages, but 'no-space-left-during-install' and 'no-matching-distribution' differ in root cause and environment context.
Both produce similar messages, but 'no-space-left-during-install' and 'could-not-find-version' differ in root cause and environment context.
